website_summaries.verdict: This 11-person tent comfortably fits three queen air mattresses and has a front screen room for storage or sitting.
pros: H2O block will keep you dry whatever the weather
Pockets and hooks give you space to store items off the floor
cons: Groundsheet isn't as durable as we'd like

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This tent is fantastic. It's easy to set up and the quality is superior. It fits a queen size air mattress with plenty of room on each side for your belongings. The enclosed porch area is great for extra storage or just to hang out in. The screens actually allow air flow which is an added bonus on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent It survived 8 grandkids sleeping in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent It survived 8 grandkids sleeping in it most of the summer and still looked like new when I put it away Good directions to put up, the kids did it without adult help
customer_reviews.author: Anne C. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat easy to set up once you get the hang of ...
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat easy to set up once you get the hang of it. The poles were color coded so that helped. The tent itself was great, although I wouldn't call the front screened in part a room, more like a large closet. Had a covered hole for extension cord which was convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to setup. Mostly, the tent is just well made. I love the space for me and my daughters. It’s nice to be able to stand and move around. The screen room is very nice to have. It has a floor which others do not. The only minor complaint and reason for only 4 stars is that if it’s raining you have to keep the screened area closed. The rain fly will not fully protect this area. It would have been nice to seek shelter from the rain while sitting in looking out. Overall, we love this tent. It’s well made, easy to setup, and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kaliber

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put up and take down and plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put up and take down and plenty of room for my daughter and 3 granddaughters. The extra area in the front was ideal for the lake toys and all extra items. Would recommend it to anyone who asked
customer_reviews.author: Teri M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Have used this tent on 2 3 night trips. One trip it rained pretty hard. No issues with water leaking. Love the screened room. Perfect for large families with gear. Docked 2 stars because of the flooring. Had a small pinecone under the floor and it ripped a tiny hole. Another place which was over a rock was worn thin with just a little walking. Need a tarp beneath, and rug on top to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Bino

customer_reviews.title: Would give 4.5
customer_reviews.text: This tent is a great size. We fit two queen air mattresses with a small table between. The porch part was great for keeping all of our food, gear, supplies, and dog. Our Great Dane slept in there with plenty of room. When putting it together the first time there was a rip that happened quite easily. DO READ and FOLLOW directions EXACTLY! the rip would not have happened if we had. Great tent. We even had rain and stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Update: bern bout a month so far. This tent has taken a beating from the weather. 3 takedowns and set ups. Has been through some major rain, wind, and heat. No leaks!!! Plus the kids have beaten on it pretty good. I silicone sprayed the poles to keep from rusting. Purchased new stakes for rain fly. Worth every penny. Had this up for bout 3 days so far. Light sprinkle no leaks. Big tent. The rain fly needs to be improved. Set up was cake once I figured it out. Will write again after some major usage.
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: spacious
customer_reviews.text: large spacious tent. exactly what we were looking for. Pros -- 1)size: I can easily fit 4 oversize cots in the main cabin section along with clothing and all other necessities. 2) easy set up: only took me about 15 minutes to set up by myself. with 2 people only takes about 10 minutes. Con's 1)challenging tear down: hard to get back into packing bag 2)front zipper closure: zipper must close to the bottom of the tent and it doesn't stay completely zipped even with the assist of the velcro (this really has not effect on the usage of the equipment)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent is frustrating AF
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this tent but putting it together was so irritating. Parts of the tent were not fitting together and when I wasn't able to get them to fit I was stuck in a tent that was falling apart with 2 small kids and a dog for a week in the woods. If you are planning on buying this tent you should save your money and buy a completely different tent. This tent is not worth what they are charging people for it.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: The tent was overall great. Pros: was very big and would fit a lot of stuff. Would fit a decent sized family but we used it for gear, sleeping, and a dog. Has great compartments and space for chairs, coolers, and clothing. Favorite part was the area that could be a complete screaned in “porch”. Cons: with less people, the large tent would not be a good choice to keep heat in. It was a poor tent for us in CO in temperatures that got down to 20s. Overall the tent held up great in the wind and rain without getting wet. It was very easy for two people to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Nataye

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The tent did come with some small holes in the screening, which was a bummer, but we easily patched those since we needed to use the tent for our Labor Day trip. During our trip, the screen ripped further and the tent door also ripped. These rips were not on seems, so the durability of this tent is questionable. We did have some water leakage through the base of the tent, but we were in a pretty severe storm. The tent is sturdy and withstood the storm though. We are unable to exchange/return the tent because it has a 30 day return policy only (something to also consider when purchasing this tent).
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Tent came day before yesterday..really fast. We set it up yesterday. Was pretty easy to do since we had been watching videos on it, plus instructions are attached to the inside of bag. I think the toughest part was placing the silver pins into the bottom of the black steel poles. Any hoot...will be camping in this this weekend (4th) July, will update you then. Oh by the way....it did rain some overnight, didn’t take on any water, not sure if it was enough to really test. I love this...screen room is roomy, sleeping area more than substantial.
customer_reviews.author: CD Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the tent but there are a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tent but there are a few flaws. 1. Rain settled in the tent during storm. 2. bottom of Door kept coming loose. Since there is a gap between zipper and Velcro’s. Leaves much open to allow insects and rain in. Pros Very spacious inside for a tall family 6”4 spouse 2 kids. Very easy to put up for first time campers Very sturdy product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tent, BUT one part of it broke on the very first day!
customer_reviews.text: We love the high ceiling and the two-room layout of this tent. It set up fairly quidkly--everything is color-coded and the instructions are good. But the elastic line inside the orange pole that holds up the porch roof snapped on the first day we used the tent! This tent would get a 5-star review, but for that. We're waiting to see how Core's customer service handles this...
customer_reviews.author: Jane Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Surprising sturdy tent.
customer_reviews.text: I lived in this tent for nine months on a beach on the Sea of Cortez doing research. I did not expect it to last more than two or three months in the sun and wind. The middle of the fourth month the rain fly finally ripped in a windstorm. The rest of the tent remained intact throughout. I did augment the supplied guy lines with high quality cordage and stakes. But beyond that, it was stock. I was favourably impressed by what I expected to be a low quality Basecamp tent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ziebell

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Tent. I like the fact that the screenroom has a sealed bottom on it. Rained pretty hard first night camping and no leaks whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Good tent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Went on a 3 night camp trip. Had pretty good weather. On the third day it rained the whole day the front door leaked a bit because the steaks didn’t hold in the ground very well. We got a few bigger heavier steaks and stretched the door out and the leaking stopped. Would suggest getting at least 3 heavier duty steaks for the entry way it also made the door zipper work much easier. Over all a good tent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas V

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE This Tent!
customer_reviews.text: We took our new Core 11 person cabin tent out for the first time and it is HUGE! This is the perfect couples tent and it really has many features we love, such as pouches, high ceiling, lots of room, a hook for your lantern and electrical opening. The screen room is spacious with plenty of room for chairs, tables and gear with great ventilation throughout the tent. Setup and takedown are both very easy. In the pictures you'll see a view from our Coleman queen air bed of the ceiling, which is an impressive height. We absolutely love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: FloridaKen

customer_reviews.title: Good Tent good price!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tent after owning the Core 9 person tent and wanting more space with the added screen room. Easy to put up but no directions if your a newbie. Overall very pleased. Wish the opening was a little taller. For the center height to be so high the opening to the tent is barely 6 ft. Had to do a lot of bending to get in and out. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! First time putting up in the dark and it was super simple, took about 20 min, but after that it was 5-10. This is super easy to set up, provides TONS of space and it’s versatile. I love that the front can be used for sleeping, storage or as a screen porch! The adults and a Great Dane all for very comfortably with room to spare! We did have a bungee snap due to over stretching, but it was super simple to restring and tie back together. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping diva 0215

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Got this because we really want a front porch tent. Our first time setting up this tent took ~30 mins; my projection is that the 2nd time will take less than 10 mins. It also heavily rained the 3rd night we used this tent. There was a little bit of rain in the front porch because we forgot to Velcro the bottom part. Overall, very sturdy, very roomy, and held up against rain very well. * Update: 2nd time took about 10 minutes to set up. The bag for the tent is roomy enough so you can fit a tarp in it too. *
customer_reviews.author: boon xiong

customer_reviews.title: Decent tent at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big tent... no way it’s an 11 person but that was expected based off previous reviews. Initial setup took a bit but once you get the general idea it goes quick. My only wish is that there were spots inside to hook led lights onto.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We've really enjoyed this tent - used it three times so far. Family of 5 - husband is 6'8" and it's tall enough for him. Easily fits two queen air mattresses, or one with a couple of cots. No complaints so far. Setting it up is a two person job, but not a difficult one.
customer_reviews.author: staci bolton

customer_reviews.title: Do a test run set up a home to  familiarize your self with proper set up
customer_reviews.text: Tent is awesome. Great design. Zippered doors and across the bottom of doors as well. The directions to sent tent up is rather vague! It is hard to follow! But, after reading them a few times and trying to match picture with each step.(need better pictures, not just one). Took a bout 1 hour to set up, by my self. But, once figuring it out it’s a piece of cake to set up. Will only take about 15-20 minutes to set now. I set it up at home for a test run. It also, rained hard the next night, check for leaks the next morning and inside was completely dry!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Veasey

customer_reviews.title: Camping
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for the price. Nice to have plenty of Headroom to move around in. The front screen zipper is a little hard to close and is extremely tight. takes a little time to set up when you're alone but not difficult. Make sure that you set up the tent at home before going camping for the first time with it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony auen

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes! Survived my family! Spacious too!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase. I was worried about spending this much on a tent but so glad I did! I had two queen air mattresses and a pack n play in the main room. I used to screen room for food storage and whain tnot. So spacious. Still had room to walk around and have everything spread out and organized. Survived camping with 3 adults, and 4 children she's 1, 5, 5, and 7. Also the set up was quick and easy. One person put it up quickly and no issues. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Leistner

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, we haven’t tested the water tightness of the tent yet as we have not had inclement weather while camping with it. But it was extremely easy to set up (all the poles and sleeves they go through are color coded) and it was the perfect size for our family of 5. Would definitely recommend this tent to families that enjoy camping and need the extra room. The front porch area is awesome and one of the best features!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Dziubla

customer_reviews.title: SO DELIGHTED WITH THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up - even for one person - but you have to be relatively coordinated. The tent itself is heavy, but can be carried in its included carrying case. Beautiful tent! Haven't gotten rained on yet - so don't know how well it will do i nthe elements... but the look, size and spaciousness made me fall in love with it already. A+
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Blasco

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Love our tent. It’s huge. Not too bad to put up Considering it’s size. Durable, roomy, and good Looking. Only complaint I have is that it takes 2 hands to unzip the outside door. Makes it difficult when you have your hands full. I purchased a second Core tent for the kids now as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up & very spacious!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very tall people and wanted a tent that would be comfortable for us. We can both stand in the back room! It's very spacious and big for a large family. You could fit two queen blow up mattresses in the room if needed. The front screen room is also nice to store stuff or to put a pack and play if you have kids. It was easy to set up because all the polls are color coded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...simple camping
customer_reviews.text: Putting the tent up was super easy! However there is a section that seems like you need to pull tighter with stakes but then zipper doesnt close so that part confused me. Negatives: our zipper continues to get stuck. The material feels cheap i am worried about rips. We didn't have rain so no view on water resistance. Size was excellent i loved how big it is! Wish there was a way to divide the big room. So far fairly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Broken pole after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed when the first night three boys and myself slept in the tent and we had pools of water even though it was a clear night but high Houston humidity. Then I realized that in the first use one of the grey tent poles cracked in half. I have included a video and pictures of broken pole. Sorry video won’t load. My 8 year old son and I were able to put it up together. It will fit 4 twin air mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Tnc

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We bought our tent nearly two years ago. We are sitting in it tonight during a huge thunderstorm thinking about how great this tent is and realized that we never reviewed it. I would highly recommend it. A ton of space and very weatherproof!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Ryddner

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This tent is massive!!! I love it, we put it ina a 2 car garage it wasn't too much space left. I was worried about the screen porch but it also has a tarp that will cover the screen so it is not chance fo leaking during rain.
customer_reviews.author: Asinvera

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and very spacious tent.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to fit some of the tent sites, but you won't feel claustrophobic! We had some pretty heavy rain but not a leak anywhere, however we had applied one coat of rain sealant also. The tent is heavy duty, looks good, and we get lots of compliments on it. You need two people to put it up and if you camp often could get real swift at it.
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up...
customer_reviews.text: This tent far exceeded my expectations. Was rather easy to setup by myself and has so far held up nicely. The rain canopy was the only thing I had an issue with but once I figured out how it went, it was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scott

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this tent!
customer_reviews.text: We used this tent camping in an awful black fly infested wooded area ... and the screened in front room was AMAZING. It saved the trip. Hanging out with beverages in our chairs in that room was just as fun as sitting by the fire without the annoyance of the black flies. The tent is sturdy, and large enough for a queen air mattress and all of the necessities too. Pockets for your personal items, hooks on the ceiling for a fan or a light - flaps for air and a rain flap for reassurance. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L. Hance

customer_reviews.title: CORE 11 Person Family Tent
customer_reviews.text: If you have enough light and at least 30 mins of your life this is the tent for you. Initially when we purchased I thought it was a instant tent, once we tried setting up it took longer than previous tents. It has many end pieces that attach the tent poles, they are plastic and are easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it camping yet, but did set it up, pinched my finger a few times but guessing once I get used to setting it up that will stop, hope it works a good out in the woods as it did in the back yard!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the family.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, lots of room. Front Screen area is really nice. Extra height is a great bonus for walking around. Screened roof really nice waking up looking up at trees. Set up is not hard. Takes two people to muscle a few of the pieces together. Ground stakes included pretty standard. The have bent some driving in the ground. Will be ordering some stronger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent, Huge inside. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Tent. We absolutely love it. Screened in porch is really nice to have for coolers, food, and anything that you don’t want to leave outside. Huge main cabin. Easy to set up. If I had to give it a con it takes two hands to open the zipper to get in and out from outside but that’s not enough to knock off a star. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy setup, nice design
customer_reviews.text: This tent has everything you need for a comfortable sleep outside. The reviews are true this tent holds up great!
customer_reviews.author: blazer

customer_reviews.title: Does Leak/ Will Need To Waterproof It
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely let in rain. Don't buy unless you plan to waterproof it thoroughly. Will hold a queen size mattress with a decent amount of room left over to walk around. Front room is a bit small but will serve it's purpose as a way to keep from tracking debris into the main area. Two camp chairs fit nicely with ample room. Rain fly fits nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Nonni Love

customer_reviews.title: Nice space for a family of 5
customer_reviews.text: Nice space but it came with lots of tiny holes in one of the floor corners. The box was broken and in bad shape. It took a while to assemble. Overall in terms of space for a family of 5 and baggage, it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used once during camping trip. Its was cold but did not do much for temperatures. We had no rain and tent was easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: The product not maid In us so many defects arrived I am returning defective product should not deal with not American made products
customer_reviews.author: john teague

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Very spacious inside. It may take a little while to put together the first time but it is worth it. We had a thunderstorm the first time we used it and while people at our campsite packed up and left, not a drop got inside our tent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul h

customer_reviews.title: Solid tent
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of Core before, figured we’d try it. Put it up on a camping trip, within 30 minutes we had a 45 minute torrential downpour. Bone dry inside. I like the ground air vents, plenty of room to stand up in. Good tent. Hoping it lasts us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good tent, not so good delivery
customer_reviews.text: This tent was delivered on time but was delivered to my house and left in the dirt in the driveway. Used the tent for a four night camping trip And it did a great job. Even in the light rain everything inside stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: shane fennell

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It was windy and cold when we were camping, the tent took it all.. it was nice and warm inside. Easy to put up and take down.. best tent we had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is a great size, and I love the screened in porch feature. It also held up like a champ through a huge storm on our first night using it. The only downsides would be that the instructions are not very clear for initial setup, and it is definitely a 2+ person job. Otherwise, perfect tent for a group.
customer_reviews.author: Esmith7X

customer_reviews.title: Came ripped twice
customer_reviews.text: Had to return two different times because there were holes in the tent and it was beat up. Super disappointed since this looked like a great tent.
customer_reviews.author: Pateishka

customer_reviews.title: Tent
customer_reviews.text: Got for me and my wife for camping great space easy to put up
customer_reviews.author: bob willis

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: First time assembling took a bit of time. YouTube helped 😆 But assembly isn't too bad once you get the hang of it. We love this tent. Plenty of room for 2 adults and 3 kids (ages 3,4 and 8). The screened in front room is also a huge plus and a great spot for all of our luggage and our lab's sleeping area.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent so easy to set up so much room
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this tent. It's tall enough for me and I'm 6'4".
customer_reviews.author: Steve V

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Tent? More like a hotel. Super easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: NickyT

customer_reviews.title: Roomy tent
customer_reviews.text: The tent is very spacious. I love the screen porch. We've used it when the bugs are bad. You can stand up easily inside the tent. You can enclose the screen porch if it is raining. Staking down the entire tent and rain fly holds up well in strong winds and rain. Haven't had any leaks and it has been through multiple storms.
customer_reviews.author: M. Plush

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent for family camping. Easy to set up, Super easy to set up the second time.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: All in all, I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Used it almost immediately, while there was some water inside, it might have blown is as there was also considerable wind - all in all, I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Big Tent, Easy to Setup
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size tent for my family of five with tons of room. It was pretty easy to setup, only took my son and I about 15 minutes. I like that you can stand completely upright inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Crowther

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room to stand!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent no problems yet. Easy to put up and fits all 5 if us comfortably. I like the screen room has a floor to where more people could sleep.
customer_reviews.author: mike spen

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tent! We have a large family, and we are no longer stepping over each other in the tent. The front room is awesome when you have boys that love to get dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Huge and beautiful curtain
customer_reviews.text: She holds up to wind, very nicely but doesn't keep even light rain out.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Delahoz

customer_reviews.title: Not resilient at all
customer_reviews.text: The very first night the front screen tore, one of the air vents seam ripped, and the orange pole for the screen room snapped. I'm not sure if I got a dud or if its poor quality. The tent was wonderfully designed but didnt stand up to any kind of weather.
customer_reviews.author: alawson2@citadel.edu

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent
customer_reviews.text: Family of 4, bought tent for weekend camping trips was able to set up in under 15min plenty of room for two cots and air mattress with room to move around in main area, and plenty of room for table in screen room to keep our food
customer_reviews.author: Skittle

customer_reviews.title: Great for star gazing
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great! It’s big, good quality and has so much ventilation. The screened in front comes in very handy when your a mosquito attraction like me.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Adam

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent, but it was used and one of the grey poles is broken. I have to get a repair kit which is a bummer, but it is a really awesome tent regardless.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN DEHART

customer_reviews.title: Large tent, durability is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: large tent. One of the big poles that holds the tent up broke on just the second time setting it up camping. Now time to find out how good their customer service is.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S. Mishler

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Used for a birthday camping party. Fitted comfortably 8 tween girls.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Her

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS TENT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tent! Easy to set up & take down. Very spacious & lots of head room. Durable & withstood heavy winds. This is definitely the best tent I have every bought!
customer_reviews.author: McN.

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space and great design. I do recommend buying better spikes to pin down the tend. The ones that come with the tent work but there are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my parents. They absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tynisa L. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Use it on a four day camping trip and I am very impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Had one pole bend in wind and one split but other than that it’s a great tent.
customer_reviews.text: We are contacting Core to get replacement poles. Not for very cold weather as the tent roof is mesh covered by a rain fly
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent..easy set up...plenty of room with a queen size...great screen room for the extras...if you have a heater the tent holds it well when in the 40’s/50’s with the rain fly on
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Everything was perfect! I had a family reunion campout and guess ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect! I had a family reunion campout and guess who had the BEST tent.... me!! It withheld the wind and the rain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: erman k. tancayo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have only used one time for a week, but have fallen in love with this tent. It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, huge tent for a good price. Easy to set up by myself and a quick tear down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tent for the price. fairly easy set up and very spacious. lots of little windows and pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Good solid tent
customer_reviews.text: A bit long on setup and was a very tight fit, but stood up well and lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: elryon

customer_reviews.title: The sky view is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Great tent with unique and easy to setup pole system. Sky view at night is amazing. Only wish it had a 2nd entry off the big room too. Great tent
customer_reviews.author: Keith and Bonnie McKay

customer_reviews.title: Taj Mahal
customer_reviews.text: Seriously - it's the taj mahal. Would work great for a family tent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Core tent
customer_reviews.text: I love the screen room and how big this tent is
customer_reviews.author: Angel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Huge tent, loved spending the weekend with lots of friends
customer_reviews.author: shelly martin

customer_reviews.title: Hideous customer service
customer_reviews.text: Core tent's great; Customer service is a joke. A center Pole broke on the 2nd set up and the Core company has ignored 2 emails and a chat request for help on their website. They don't return phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Prusaitis

customer_reviews.title: So frustrating! Where is the instructions??? This does not hold up well in the wind! Do not buy this tent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it got pretty good reviews. Where is the instructions???? This is rediculous! Not 20 minute install! This tent is not worth the 250.00 I spent so disappointing! It does not fit three queen size beds comfortably. This tent is horrible quality and took over an hour to install. It did not withstand any wind! It broke the first night! We will be taking it back! I will let you know how the customer service is once I contact them. We are stuck for 9 days with a crappy tent! 😭
customer_reviews.author: jonsey123

customer_reviews.title: Quality ¡¡
customer_reviews.text: great tent ¡¡¡ great quality, very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Vir
